ygData.subject: Re: Abandoning the embassy
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She looked at Iron Raptor and nodded, Excuse me for a moment,  she walked out of the room and went into the hallway. She opened her link. What?

::Battera::

She looked at Iron Raptor and nodded, "Excuse me for a moment,"  she 
walked out of the room and went into the hallway. She opened her 
link."What? Abandoning the base?  Are we still hosting the peace 
talks?  What happened? What's going on? Oh, please tell me, what 
happened to make Vulois abandon the base like this.  I was just about 
to talk to the maximal leader."

She was suddenly feeling scared.  She had tried her best to complete 
her mission and jsut as she was about to, they abandon everything.
She felt her face loose color and her spark drop to her feet.  She 
leaned back against a wall and slid down into a sitting position. 
She was still in shock.  "Why now?" she whispered to herself.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::CyberShark::
> 
>     He received the message and stopped in his tracks. What should 
he do? Should he continue to the Destron base? Or go back and wait of 
orders?
>     "Vulois, there was no luck with the Predacons, I am going to 
the Destron base," CyberShark said. "I will accompany Battera on her 
way up."
>     "Battera, it's me, CyberShark," He said on another 
frequency. "The Embassy is moving, as I'm sure you've heard. Comm me 
once your ready to leave, I'll join you."
